thread.title: Perfect Overnighter
thread.title_full: Perfect Overnighter - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SurreyTwoWheeler
title: Perfect Overnighter
text: We booked to see Jersey Boys at the Piccadilly Theatre and decided to turn it into an overnighter at Ham Yard Hotel. We started with afternoon tea, which was excellent quality, although service was a little slow as it was very busy. Our Luxury Room was top notch, the largest bathroom we have ever had, with really comfortable beds. We were treated very well by all the staff, who were very courteous and helpful.
